job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Applies existing machine learning techniques to new problems and datasets.
     * Evaluates the outcomes and performance of machine learning systems.
     * Identifies issues and recommends improvements to machine learning systems and the data they use.
     * Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors moderately complex programs/scripts.
     * Applies agreed standards and tools to achieve a well-engineered result.
     * Monitors and reports on progress.
     * Identifies issues related to ML development activities.
     * Proposes practical ML solutions to resolve issues.
     * Collaborates in reviews of work with others as appropriate.
     * Elicits requirements for systems and software / ML life cycle working practices and automation.
     * Selects systems and software / ML life cycle working practices forcomponents and micro-services.
     * Deploys automation to achieve well-engineered and secure outcomes. Systems integration and build
     * Defines the ML modules needed for an integration build and produces a build definition for each generation of the solution.
     * Accepts completed ML modules, ensuring that they meet defined criteria.
     * Applies existing data science techniques to new problems and datasets using specialised programming techniques.
     * Evaluates the outcomes and performance of data science models.
     * Identifies and implements opportunities to train and improve models and the data they use.
     * Applies data engineering standards and tools to create and maintain data pipelines and extract, transform and load data.
     * Supports monitoring of the external environment and assessment of emerging technologies.
     * Contributes to the creation of reports, technology road mapping and the sharing of knowledge and insights.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer

* Applies existing machine learning techniques to new problems and datasets.
     * Evaluates the outcomes and performance of machine learning systems.
     * Identifies issues and recommends improvements to machine learning systems and the data they use.
     * Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors moderately complex programs/scripts.
     * Applies agreed standards and tools to achieve a well-engineered result.
     * Monitors and reports on progress.
     * Identifies issues related to ML development activities.
     * Proposes practical ML solutions to resolve issues.
     * Collaborates in reviews of work with others as appropriate.
     * Elicits requirements for systems and software / ML life cycle working practices and automation.
     * Selects systems and software / ML life cycle working practices forcomponents and micro-services.
     * Deploys automation to achieve well-engineered and secure outcomes. Systems integration and build
     * Defines the ML modules needed for an integration build and produces a build definition for each generation of the solution.
     * Accepts completed ML modules, ensuring that they meet defined criteria.
     * Applies existing data science techniques to new problems and datasets using specialised programming techniques.
     * Evaluates the outcomes and performance of data science models.
     * Identifies and implements opportunities to train and improve models and the data they use.
     * Applies data engineering standards and tools to create and maintain data pipelines and extract, transform and load data.
     * Supports monitoring of the external environment and assessment of emerging technologies.
     * Contributes to the creation of reports, technology road mapping and the sharing of knowledge and insights.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes applying existing machine learning techniques, evaluating model performance, and improving ML systems and data. It also details software development tasks focused on productionizing ML models and data engineering for pipelines, aligning strongly with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer.

phrases: Applies existing machine learning techniques to new problems and datasets.
Evaluates the outcomes and performance of machine learning systems.
Identifies issues and recommends improvements to machine learning systems and the data they use.
Proposes practical ML solutions to resolve issues.
Applies existing data science techniques to new problems and datasets using specialised programming techniques.
Evaluates the outcomes and performance of data science models.
Identifies and implements opportunities to train and improve models and the data they use.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the core activities of building, evaluating, and refining machine learning and data science models.

phrases: Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors moderately complex programs/scripts.
Applies agreed standards and tools to achieve a well-engineered result.
Defines the ML modules needed for an integration build and produces a build definition for each generation of the solution.
Accepts completed ML modules, ensuring that they meet defined criteria.
job_tasks.justification: These describe the process of writing code, testing, and integrating software components, which are fundamental to software development, especially in the context of productionizing ML.

phrases: Deploys automation to achieve well-engineered and secure outcomes. Systems integration and build
Elicits requirements for systems and software / ML life cycle working practices and automation.
Selects systems and software / ML life cycle working practices forcomponents and micro-services.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases point to the deployment, automation, and management of ML systems and their life cycles, which are key aspects of MLOps.

phrases: Applies data engineering standards and tools to create and maintain data pipelines and extract, transform and load data.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions data pipelines and ETL processes, which are central to data engineering.

phrases: Monitors and reports on progress.
Contributes to the creation of reports, technology road mapping and the sharing of knowledge and insights.
job_tasks.justification: These indicate an involvement in reporting, strategic planning (road mapping), and knowledge sharing, which requires understanding business context and goals.

phrases: Identifies issues and recommends improvements to machine learning systems and the data they use.
Proposes practical ML solutions to resolve issues.
soft_skills.justification: These phrases highlight the ability to identify problems and propose practical, actionable solutions.

phrases: Collaborates in reviews of work with others as appropriate.
Contributes to the creation of reports, technology road mapping and the sharing of knowledge and insights.
soft_skills.justification: These indicate working with others, sharing information, and contributing to team efforts.

phrases: Supports monitoring of the external environment and assessment of emerging technologies.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase shows a focus on staying updated with new technologies and the external landscape.

phrases: Designs, codes, verifies, tests, documents, amends and refactors moderately complex programs/scripts.
Applies agreed standards and tools to achieve a well-engineered result.
Deploys automation to achieve well-engineered and secure outcomes.
soft_skills.justification: These phrases imply taking responsibility for the development lifecycle and ensuring high-quality, well-engineered outcomes.
